summary: Costa and Camille have an ungainly relationship, awkwardly built on complicit affection.
cast: Clémentine Beaugrand|Gérald Thomassin|Guillaume Saurrel|Gwendoline Godquin|Jany Garachana|François Damiens|Noémie Herbet|Alice Paulicevich|Anne Paulicevich|Cyril Billard|Karen Hottois|Patrick Bissac|Paul Bissac
title: Le premier venu
